titleStmt.title: Anno. XXVIII. Henrici VIII. Actes made in the parliament bego[n]ne and holden at Westm[inster], the. VIII. daye of Iune, in the. XXVIII. yere of the reygne of our most drad soueraine lord kyng Henry the. VIII. and there continued and kepte tyll the dissolution of the same parliament the. XVIII. of Iuly, to the honour of God, and for the common weale and profyt of this realme.
Public General Acts. 1536-1537. 28 Hen.VIII
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)

titleStmt.title: Anno. XXVIII. Henrici VIII. Actes made in the parliament bego[n]ne and holden at Westm[inster], the. VIII. daye of Iune, in the. XVIII. of Iuly, to the honour of God, and for the common weale and profyt of this realme.
Public General Acts. 1536-1537. 28 Hen.VIII
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)
Henry VIII, King of England, 1491-1547.

publicationStmt.publisher: Tho. Berthelet Regis impressor excudebat, cum priuilegio,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Anno vicesimo octavo. Henrici octavi.
In this edition, the imprint is in four lines--STC.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library, Cambridge, England.
